short_summary: Two (2) Senior Project Managers for Department of National Defence (DND) with the services of Six (6) Suppliers
description: Two (2) Senior Project Managers for Department of National Defence (DND) with the services of Six (6) Suppliers
full_summary:
### Two (2) Senior Project Managers - Request for Proposal

#### Tender Title and Information

* Tender Number: W8486-249527/A
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: 2024-02-27
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-25 14:00:00
* Tender Status: Closed (Expired)

#### Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the services of Two (2) Senior Project Managers to support the department's project management requirements. This request for proposal (RFP) is for the establishment of up to two (2) contracts, each for an initial one-year term, with the option to extend for four one-year irrevocable option periods. This RFP is open to pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-18TSPS.

#### Scope of Work

The successful supplier(s) will provide senior project management services to support the department's project delivery requirements. The scope of work includes:

* Providing senior project management services to support project delivery
* Managing project schedules, budgets, and resources
* Developing and maintaining project plans and documentation
* Coordinating with stakeholders and team members

#### Evaluation Criteria

The RFP will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical Merit: 60%
* Price: 40%

#### Security Requirements

The successful supplier(s) will be required to obtain a Secret security clearance and will be subject to the Industrial Security Program (ISP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada.

#### Location of Work

The work will be performed in the National Capital Region, specifically at the DND Carling Campus and/or the Centre Block, 975 St Joseph Blvd, Gatineau, QC.

#### Contact Information

For further information or to submit questions, please contact Jennifer Ouellet, Contracting Authority, at jennifer.ouellet2@forces.gc.ca.

#### Important Notice

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. This RFP is open to pre-qualified suppliers only. To obtain more information on how to become a pre-qualified supplier, please contact Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC). [1] [2]

Note: 
[1] https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/about-us/news-and-events/transition-canadabuys-tender-management-application#msg
[2]
